derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: probably related to Dutch meun and German Münne, influenced by Anglo-Norman French menu 'small, minnow'

entry.tran: 鲦鱼，米诺鱼(一种极小的淡水鱼)
entry.def: A minnow is a very small fish that lives in lakes and rivers.

means.word_mean: 1. very small European freshwater fish common in gravelly streams
